answerText: The Narrative of Arthur Gordon Pym of Nantucket[10] In this short story by the same author, Prince Prospero and some nobles hold the title ball in an abbey during a plague.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Schindler + Yale C + Minnesota B | 13 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This novel ends with the title character and Dirk Peters heading toward the South Pole. For 10 points each:  [10] Identify this novel whose protagonist stows away on Mr. Barnard's whaling ship, the Grampus, until a storm and a mutiny force him and his companions to eat their companion Richard Parker.
